examples.example: 我在邮件里添加了相关附件，以便对方能更清楚地了解信息。

translate.english: I added relevant attachments in the email so that the other party can understand the information more clearly.

examples.example: 我认真地整理了文件并附上相关附件，然后及时发送给了合作伙伴。

translate.english: I carefully sorted the documents and attached relevant attachments, and then sent them to the partner in a timely manner.

examples.example: 我给朋友发邮件时附上了相关附件，期望能给他带来帮助。

translate.english: When I sent an email to my friend, I attached relevant attachments, expecting to bring him help.
